modelleertaal.modelregels: r = sqrt(x^2 + y^2) Fgrav = G * ms * Ma / r^2 Fresx = - Fgrav * x / r ax = Fresx / ms dvx = ax * dt vx = vx + dvx dx = vx * dt x = x + dx Fresy = - Fgrav * y / r ay = Fresy / ms dvy = ay * dt vy = vy + dvy dy = vy * dt y = y + dy als r < Ra dan stop eindals t = t + dt
modelleertaal.startwaarden: 'model 17 satelliet 'startwaarden G = 6,67*10^-11 Ma = 6,0*10^24 'kg Ra = 6,4*10^6 'm ms = 1,0*10^3 'kg dt = 10 's t = 0 's x = 0 'm y = 1,0*10^7 'm vx = 6,5*10^3 'm/s vy = 0 'm/s
